item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Sunday, December 29, 2024 at 3:15 PM UTC
item.description:
1. 38C3: Illegal Instructions (279 points | 40 comments)
2. Apple Photos phones home on iOS 18 and macOS 15 (881 points | 659 comments)
3. BioTerrorism Will Save Your Life with the 4 Thieves Vinegar Collective [video] (47 points | 16 comments)
4. WebGL Fluid Simulation (192 points | 21 comments)
5. Build a working game of Tetris in Conway's Game of Life (2014) (61 points | 2 comments)
6. Intel's $475M error: the silicon behind the Pentium division bug (268 points | 67 comments)
7. We've not been trained for this: life after the Newag DRM disclosure [video] (222 points | 32 comments)
8. Christmas Punch Requires a Formerly Forbidden Fruit (19 points | 4 comments)
9. Where can you go in Europe by train in 8h? (528 points | 350 comments)
10. I automated my job application process (461 points | 656 comments)
11. Coupling nitrogen-vacancy center spins in diamond to a grape dimer (29 points | 14 comments)
12. I don't do Domain Driven Design (69 points | 24 comments)
13. Libsearch: Simple index-free full-text search for JavaScript (43 points | 8 comments)
14. EmacsConf 2024 Notes (296 points | 102 comments)
15. The Average American Spent 2.5 Months on Their Phone in 2024 (100 points | 99 comments)

17. Personal Mail Server on OpenBSD (2019) (93 points | 50 comments)
18. Fish 4.0: The Fish of Theseus (681 points | 120 comments)
19. Bad keming: Kerning failures, plus other typographical and font mishaps (81 points | 18 comments)
20. Racket-embed-images-in-source-text (4 points | discuss)
21. 38C3: Blinkencity, radio controlling street lamps and power plants [video] (130 points | 24 comments)
22. Hello World on z/OS (2018) (60 points | 28 comments)
23. Guide to mechanical keyboards (146 points | 170 comments)
24. Carlsen disqualified from World Rapid and Blitz championship for wearing jeans (307 points | 383 comments)
25. The Gambler Who Cracked the Horse-Racing Code (2018) (128 points | 55 comments)
26. Show HN: Anki AI Utils (156 points | 20 comments)
27. Finding and exploiting hidden features of Animal Crossing's NES emulator (2018) (99 points | 2 comments)
28. NASA, Axiom Space Change Assembly Order of Commercial Space Station (79 points | 29 comments)
29. Numbers Are Leaves (232 points | 61 comments)
30. Joco almost died at launch. Now, it's a lifeline for e-bike delivery riders (90 points | 40 comments)
